title: Phase 4: ML/AI Models
description: Feature engineering, model training pipeline, evaluation, deployment

title: Research: OHLCV data sources for US equities and crypto
description: Evaluate vendors/APIs for historical + real-time OHLCV for US equities, futures, and major crypto pairs; compare cost, coverage, rate limits, licensing, and Python integration.

title: Design: Strategy SDK lifecycle and interfaces
description: Specify strategy lifecycle hooks, required interfaces, configuration handling, state persistence, scheduling, and error semantics. Include how strategies receive market data and emit orders/signals.
acceptance_criteria:
- Doc with lifecycle diagram (text ok) and interface signatures
- Example strategy skeleton or pseudo-API included

title: Phase 3: Strategy Framework
description: Base strategy interface, signal generation, portfolio and risk management

title: CoreV01: Trading Platform Development
description: Multi-asset algorithmic trading platform with ML/AI strategy framework, supporting both crypto and traditional markets with hybrid infrastructure deployment

title: Research: Interactive Brokers API integration
description: Research IB products, features, API options (REST/WebSocket/TWS API), authentication, account types, data feeds, order types, and Python integration best practices

title: Research: MLflow setup and deployment (2026)
description: Research latest MLflow getting started guides, installation methods, Docker setup, tracking server configuration, model registry setup, and integration patterns for ML workflows

title: Phase 7: Live Trading
description: Broker/exchange integration, order execution, risk controls, monitoring

title: Phase 2: Data Pipeline
description: OHLCV/LOB data ingestion, storage, validation for both crypto and traditional markets

title: TimescaleDB schema + retention/compression policies (5y 1m, 10y 1d)
description: Produce DDL + migration for symbols, ohlcv_1m/1d, trades, orders, fills; add hypertables, compression, and retention policies.

title: Design: Portfolio and accounting model
description: Define positions, cash, PnL, fees, FX conversion, and corporate action handling. Specify update rules for fills, transfers, and valuation snapshots.
acceptance_criteria:
- Doc with entity definitions and update rules
- PnL and valuation formulas documented

close_reason: Patrol complete - no rigs configured, no polecats

description: Per-rig worker monitor patrol loop with progressive nudging.

title: Design: Backtesting engine requirements and simulation model
description: Define backtesting requirements: event-driven simulation, slippage/fees, market impact assumptions, corporate actions, and required inputs/outputs. Include metrics and reproducibility expectations.
acceptance_criteria:
- Doc with simulation assumptions and required inputs
- Output metrics list and reproducibility requirements

title: Witness Patrol
description: Per-rig worker monitor patrol loop with progressive nudging.

description: Draft a high-level architecture for corev01: components/services, primary data flows (market data, strategy, execution, storage, ML), and deployment profiles (local dev, single-host, hybrid). Include key infra components and open decisions.
acceptance_criteria:
- Markdown doc in docs/architecture/ describing components, data flows, and deployment profiles
- List of open decisions and assumptions

title: Research: TimescaleDB setup and deployment (2026)
description: Research latest TimescaleDB getting started guides, installation methods, Docker setup, best practices for time-series data storage, compression policies, and retention strategies for financial data

title: Research: Risk management checks and limits
description: Survey common pre-trade and post-trade risk checks (notional limits, leverage, exposure, kill switch, fat-finger). Recommend checks appropriate for corev01 and where they sit in the order flow.
acceptance_criteria:
- Doc with recommended checks and rationale
- Integration points in order flow identified

title: Implement crypto adapter (Coinbase or Kraken)
description: Build crypto exchange adapter for market data + order routing; normalize events into canonical contracts; choose Coinbase or Kraken based on research ticket.

title: MLflow tracking integration for strategies
description: Add MLflow experiment tracking (params/metrics/artifacts) to backtest + live strategy runs; define naming conventions.

title: Phase 5: Backtesting Engine
description: Historical data replay, performance metrics, slippage modeling, reporting

title: Research: US crypto exchange connectivity (Coinbase, Kraken)
Design: Order lifecycle and OMS state machine
description: Define canonical order model and state transitions (new, routed, partial, filled, canceled, rejected). Include idempotency, retries, and broker/exchange mapping considerations.
acceptance_criteria:
- State machine documented with transitions and required fields
- Notes on broker mapping and idempotency rules

title: Witness patrol cycle
close_reason: Patrol cycle complete - no polecats, no issues

title: Deacon Patrol
description: Mayor's daemon patrol loop for handling callbacks, health checks, and cleanup.

title: Phase 6: Paper Trading
description: Simulated execution, real-time data integration, position tracking, P&L

title: Research: Coinbase API integration
description: Research Coinbase products (Pro/Advanced Trade/Prime), API features, authentication, WebSocket feeds, order types, rate limits, and Python SDK options

title: Repo scaffold (Python + uv) + local compose for TimescaleDB & MLflow
description: Create project structure, uv config, base packages, and docker-compose for TimescaleDB + MLflow; include make/cli entrypoints if desired.

title: Design: Data ingestion and normalization pipeline
description: Define how raw vendor data becomes canonical events: ingestion modes (batch/stream), normalization rules, storage partitions, and backfill strategy. Cover data quality checks and replay for backtests.
acceptance_criteria:
- Doc with ingestion stages, transformations, and storage layout
- Backfill/replay and data quality checks specified

title: Implement broker adapter: Interactive Brokers (Python API)
description: Build IBKR adapter for market data + order routing; normalize events into canonical contracts; include connection management and retries.

title: Phase 1: Foundation & Core Infrastructure
description: Core data models, configuration system, logging, monitoring framework

title: Design: Paper trading environment and broker simulation
description: Define paper trading scope: live data sources, order routing to simulator, reconciliation, and differences from live trading. Specify how paper fills are generated and persisted.
acceptance_criteria:
- Doc with flow from market data to simulated fills
- Clear differences from live trading documented

title: Design: Observability baseline (logging, metrics, tracing)
description: Define baseline observability for corev01: log schema, metrics to capture (latency, fill rates, PnL), tracing boundaries, and alert thresholds for key failures.
acceptance_criteria:
- Doc with log fields, metrics list, and tracing boundaries
- Initial alert thresholds or SLOs listed

title: Define canonical event contracts (Bar/Trade/Quote/Order/Fill)
description: Specify schemas/enums/fields for all core events; include serialization format and versioning guidance.
